We must not think of defeat, but of victory. However forbidding may be the circumstances, lay hold on the promises of God. They are for us. We are 


                                -280- 

none of us of ourselves adequate for the work. In our connection with God lies our success. Faith, living, active faith, must be brought into our labors as never before. Faith is the medium of connection between human weakness and divine power.--Letter 24, 1888, p. 3. (To Elder S. N. Haskell, Jan. 24, 1888.)
